text: Chishiki no nai-sha-tachi wa,`arrā wa, naze watashi-tachi ni hanashikake rarezu, mata shirushi o kudasa renai nodarou.' To iu. Izen ni mo kare-ra no yō ni iu mono ga ita. Kare-ra no kokoro wa onajiyōna monodearu. Shikkari shita shinkō o motsu hitobito ni wa, ware wa shuju no shirushi o sudeni meiji shite iru
